field.label: Enabled
field.help: Select if this rule is enabled or not

field.label: Sequence
field.help: Rule number sequence, the lowest will be the first match.

field.label: Rule Action
field.help:
Block: Blocks only selected categories (and blacklisted items).
BlockAll: Blocks all navigation, except selected categories (and whitelisted items).

field.label: IP
field.help: Enter the source hosts or subnets that this rule will apply to

field.label: Categories
field.help: Select categories to use, leave empty for all.

field.label: Blacklisted Domains
field.help: Blacklisted domains. If some domain is not already categorized is a good idea to put it here.

field.label: Blacklist RegEx
field.help:
Blacklist regular expressions.
You must use a regular expression, use a comma or press Enter for new item.
Examples:
mydomain.com -> matches on *.mydomain.com
^https?:\/\/([a-zA-Z]+)\.mydomain\. -> matches on http(s)://textONLY.mydomain.*
\.gif$ -> matches on \*.gif but not on \*.gif\test
\[0-9]+\.gif$ -> matches on \123.gif but not on \test.gif
TIP: You can also paste a comma separated list into this field.

field.label: Whitelisted Domains
field.help: Whitelisted domains. Exceptions that not must be filtered by WebFilter

field.label: Whitelist RegEx
field.help:
Whitelist regular expressions.
You must use a regular expression, use a comma or press Enter for new item.
Examples:
mydomain.com -> matches on *.mydomain.com
^https?:\/\/([a-zA-Z]+)\.mydomain\. -> matches on http(s)://textONLY.mydomain.*
\.gif$ -> matches on \*.gif but not on \*.gif\test
\[0-9]+\.gif$ -> matches on \123.gif but not on \test.gif
TIP: You can also paste a comma separated list into this field.

field.label: HTTPS - SSL Options
field.help: Following options are ONLY valid with HTTPS inspection enabled.

field.label: SafeSearch Filter
field.help: Enable the SafeSearch filter for searchengines sites (Google, Yahoo, DuckDuckGo, etc

field.label: Google GSuite restricted
field.help: Insert here the domain that will be allowed to use Google GSuite. All accounts that are not in this domain will be blocked to use it.

field.label: URL Blocked Page
field.help: Enter an URL to show while user is attempting to access some blocked page.

field.label: Rule Description
field.help: Enter a description to explain what this rule will do.
